name: Diageo
goal: To represent the European and Global commercial interests of Diageo in dialogue with the EU Institutions
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Enlargement, Environment, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Boost for jobs, growth and investment
Connected digital single market
Fairer internal market
EU trade agreements and related global trade issues
Health and social policy
Deeper and fairer Economic and Monetary Union
Consumer information
Corporate Governance
Environment
